entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST III
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

DRAGON QUEST III: The Seeds of Salvation‚Äîone of the most highly acclaimed and best-selling games in the franchise is finally here for mobile! Now all three instalments of the Erdrick Trilogy can be played in the palm of your hand! Every wondrous weapon, spectacular spell and awesome adversary in this rich fantasy world is yours to discover in a single standalone package. Download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! DRAGON QUEST III: The Seeds of Salvation has an independent storyline and can be enjoyed without playing DRAGON QUEST I or DRAGON QUEST II. ‚ÄªIn-game text is available in English only. ‚óÜ Prologue On the morning of their sixteenth birthday, the child of Ortega, hero of the land of Aliahan, is charged with a seemingly impossible task by the King himself: to slay the Archfiend Baramos, master of darkness! What trials await our intrepid hero as they set out to take on a quest not even their legendary father was strong enough to complete? ‚óÜGame Features „ÉªFreely Customisable Party System. Set out on an unforgettable adventure with a party of up to four characters who can be customised to your exact specifications at Patty‚Äôs Party Planning Place! Choose names, genders and jobs, and put together the team of your dreams! „ÉªFreely Changeable Vocations Your party members can be assigned any one of up to 9 vocations, a choice which will dictate their stats, equipment, spells and abilities. Though the hero‚Äôs role has been decided by fate, the jobs of all the other characters are yours to change as you see fit. Characters who change jobs will be returned to Level 1 and have their attributes halved, but they will retain all the spells and abilities they‚Äôve learned, allowing you to tailor your team to perfectly suit your needs. Turn a priest into a warrior to add healing abilities to your swordsman‚Äôs arsenal, or mix it up any other way you like! The possibilities are endless! „ÉªExperience an epic RPG experience with over 30 hours of gameplay with added features to the original release! Travel across multiple continents and dungeons as you level up your characters and unlock new spells and abilities. The personality system changes how your character grows making your party always unique. Mini-games like medal collecting to unlock powerful new items that were not available in the original release. Discover and explore bonus dungeons and location after completing the main plot. „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the multi-million selling series, beloved both in Japan and beyond, and see how the masterful talents of series creator Yuji Horii first combined with the revolutionary synthesizer sounds of Koichi Sugiyama and the wildly popular manga illustrations of Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball) to create a gaming sensation. [OS Compatibility] iOS 12.0 or higher

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DQM: The Dark Prince
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫999,99 [‚Ç∫999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.499,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

Application Description

Overview DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince comes to smartphones! Compose your very own team of monsters from across the Dragon Quest series and engage in thrilling battles against your foes. Recruit monsters from the wild world around you and combine them to synthesize new creatures as you see fit. With over 500 monsters to choose from and a revamped synthesis system to explore, you can mix and match to you heart's content to create your favorite cute critters and dastardly supervillains, as well as brand-new additions to the monstrous roll call. Your quest to become the greatest monster wrangler of all time starts here! Story This is the tale of Psaro, a young man cursed, and the adventure upon which he and his trusted friends embark. When the curse put upon him by his father, the Master of Monsterkind, renders him incapable of harming any creature of monster blood, Psaro vows to become a monster wrangler in order to break the spell. On his journey, he will befriend many monsters, train them to be stronger, synthesize powerful new allies and take on ever more dangerous foes. Join Psaro and his friends on their campaign for monster-wrangling glory! (The network mode Online Battles from the console version, where players battle one another in real time, is not included.) Game Features - Explore Nadiria, the Magical Monster Realm On his quest for greatness, Psaro will traverse the multifarious Circles of Nadiria. Whether it be made entirely of cake and sweets or fraught with rivers of bubbling lava, each Circle plays host to a wealth of bewitching adventures. As time passes in Nadiria, so too do the seasons change, with different weather conditions tempting new monsters out of hiding and revealing paths to undiscovered areas. The Circles of Nadiria are sure to provide a fresh experience every time you visit. - Over 500 Unique Monsters With such varied environments to explore, you can expect them to be inhabited by a plethora of monsters. While many can be recruited in battle, occasionally a defeated monster will ask to join your team of its own accord. Befriend as many monsters as you can, then combine them to synthesize new creatures and build a unique party to your exact liking. - Enjoy All the DLC from the Console Version The smartphone version includes the DLC packs from the console version: the Mole Hole, Coach Joe's Dungeon Gym and Treasure Trunks. Make the most of their unique features to enhance your adventure. - Test Your Might Against Other Players Register your team for the network mode Quickfire Contests to participate in automated battles against the party data of 30 other players. Once a day you can earn stat-boosting items as a prize, and the monsters from any team you defeat will be added to your roster (up to rank B monsters only). Recommended Device Specifications - iPhone 11 or later - iPad (10th generation) or later - iPad mini (6th generation) or later - iPad Air (5th generation) or later - iPad Pro (4th generation) or later Graphics settings can be adjusted to improve performance. Running the game on devices that do not meet the recommended specifications can result in crashes due to insufficient memory, or other unexpected errors. We are unable to provide support for devices that do not meet the recommended specifications. OS Compatibility iOS 13.0 or later

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST V
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫399,99 ~ ‚Ç∫799,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

******************** This grand adventure, unfolding over three generations, is now available to play in the palm of your hand! Take your place among a family of heroes, sharing in all the triumphs and tragedies of their storied lives! Enjoy three generations‚Äô worth of adventure in one standalone package! There will be a fee to download the game but download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! *In-game text is available in English only. ******************** ‚óÜPrologue Our hero begins the story as a small boy, travelling the world with his father, Pankraz. Over the course of his many adventures, this lovable lad learns and grows. And when he finally becomes a man, he resolves to continue his father‚Äôs unfinished quest‚Äîto find the Legendary Hero... This thrilling tale on a stunning scale can now be enjoyed on pocket-sized devices! ‚óÜGame Feature „ÉªMake Friends with Mighty Monsters! The fearsome monsters you face in battle can now become your friends, giving you access to unique spells and abilities‚Äîand a whole host of strategic possibilities! „ÉªConverse Freely with your Fellow Party Members! The party chat function allows you to converse freely with the cast of colourful characters who will accompany you on your adventure. So don‚Äôt hesitate to turn to them for advice and idle chit-chat whenever the urge assails you! „Éª360-Degree Views Rotate your viewpoint in towns and villages through a full 360 degrees to make sure you don‚Äôt miss a thing! „ÉªAI Battles Tired of giving orders? Your faithful companions can be instructed to fight automatically! Use the various tactics at your disposal to see off even the toughest enemies with ease! „ÉªThe Casino With slot machines, poker, the monster arena and the exciting slime races of the slurpodrome, the casino is sure to provide you with a little light relief when the pressures of adventuring prove too great. Better still, you can exchange the tokens you earn for all kinds of exciting items, making taking a break well worth your while! „ÉªTreasures ‚Äòn‚Äô Trapdoors Take dice in hand and roll your way around specially designed game boards, enjoying a whole range of exciting events as you go! Some of the things you‚Äôll see won‚Äôt be available anywhere else, and if you manage to make it to the end, you can win some really great rewards! „ÉªBruise the Ooze is Back! Bruise the Ooze, the slime-smashing minigame introduced in the Nintendo DS version, is back with a bang! Tap the slimes within the time limit to earn points in this super-simple yet fiendishly addictive goo-splatting extravaganza! „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). -------------------- [Supported Operating Systems] iOS11.0 and above. [Supported Devices] iPhone 5S/iPod touch (6th Generation)/iPad (5th Generation) and above.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST II
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

The second instalment in the celebrated Dragon Quest series finally comes to mobile! Explore fair lands and foul dungeons in this all-time classic RPG! Every wondrous weapon, spectacular spell and awesome adversary in this rich fantasy world is yours to discover in a single standalone package. Download it once, and there‚Äôs nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download! ‚ÄªIn-game text is available in English only. ‚óÜ Prologue A century has passed since the events of DRAGON QUEST, during which time three new nations have been founded by the offspring of the great hero of Alefgard. But the peace they have long enjoyed is no more. Demon hosts summoned forth from the darkness by the fallen High Priest Hargon have brought the land to the brink of ruin once again. Now, the young prince of Midenhall‚Äîa descendant of the legendary warrior Erdrick‚Äîmust set out to find the two other heirs to the heroic bloodline so that together they might defeat the nefarious Hargon and restore peace to their world. ‚óÜ Game Features „ÉªWhether you‚Äôre keen to pick up where the first part of the Erdrick Trilogy left off, or are entirely new to the series, DRAGON QUEST II: Luminaries of the Legendary Line is sure to take you on an unforgettable journey. „ÉªIn this early example of an open-world adventure, players are free to wander the wilds, brave monster-infested dungeons, or take to the seas in search of new lands‚Äîdiscovering ever more powerful abilities and valuable treasures along the way! „ÉªSimple, Intuitive Controls The game‚Äôs controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play. „ÉªExperience the multi-million selling series, beloved both in Japan and beyond, and see how the masterful talents of series creator Yuji Horii first combined with the revolutionary synthesizer sounds of Koichi Sugiyama and the wildly popular manga illustrations of Akira Toriyama to create a gaming sensation. [OS Compatibility] iOS 12.0 or higher

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Is This Seat Taken?
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫199,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫149,99 [‚Ç∫149,99 ~ ‚Ç∫199,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It‚Äôs a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you‚Äôre in charge of who sits where. Whether it‚Äôs the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won‚Äôt be happy sitting next to a stranger who‚Äôs wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won‚Äôt be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It‚Äôs all about reading the room to find the perfect placement! Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm. - Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters. - Discover each character‚Äôs unique traits‚Äîrelatable, outlandish, and everything in between. - Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards. - Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress‚Äîfrom bus rides to banquets!

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions. Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world. How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune. Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff? You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again! Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you! Pump it up and chill ;) **************** Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

  • ÊïÖ‰∫ãÊ®°Âºè+Ëá™Áî±Ê®°ÂºèÂêàÈõÜÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫199,99 [‚Ç∫199,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • ÂäáÊÉÖÊ®°ÂºèÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Ëá™Áî±Ê®°ÂºèÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • ÊïÖ‰∫ãÊ®°Âºè+Ëá™Áî±Ê®°ÂºèÂêàÈõÜÔºö‚Ç∫199,99

Application Description

„ÄêGame Introduction„Äë 'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content. „ÄêIn-App Purchases Unlock„Äë Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate. 'Song of the Knight': The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey. 'Shining Stars': The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines. „ÄêDevice Support„Äë ¬∑ iOS 10.0 and above ¬∑ Operating memory of 3GB and above ¬∑ iPhone 7 and above ¬∑ iPad Air 3 and above „ÄêContact Us„Äë If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email. Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic new lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of gameplay with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

entry.title: Advanced Comprehension Therapy
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫899,99 [‚Ç∫899,99 ~ ‚Ç∫999,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫899,99

Application Description

Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you‚Äôre looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. ** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite ** Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension. 1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like ‚ÄúThe baby sleeps.‚Äù Work up to finding ‚ÄúThe grandparent is told a secret by the child‚Äù from closely related pictures. * 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives 2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9. * 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials * Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge * Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions * Hear each word as you touch it 3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like ‚ÄúTouch the pencil.‚Äù Work up to brain-bending challenges like ‚ÄúBefore you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.‚Äù * 16 levels of difficulty for following directions * Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension * Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions In All Activities: * Enjoy 1000‚Äôs of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos * Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully * Track progress with detailed e-mail reports * Record yourself on-screen and send it when you‚Äôre finished * Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding * Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use * No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed ------------------------------------------------- Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For? * Speech-Language Pathologists * Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate) * Stroke & TBI Survivors * Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties * Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level! ------------------------------------------------- Which Skills Does This App Target? * Auditory Comprehension (listening) * Reading Comprehension * Attention to Detail * Working Memory (holding information) * Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they) * Adjectives (colors, size, shading) * Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar) * Temporal Concepts (before/after) * Conditional Directions (if/then) * Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors) ------------------------------------------------- Download now to get started ‚Äì or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite! Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Pro Camera by Moment
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫399,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Bundle - Limited DiscountÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Slow ShutterÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Pro BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Time-lapseÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Unlock Time-lapse - LimitedÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Unlock Slow Shutter - LimitedÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras ‚Äì exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio ‚Äì without being complicated. If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you‚Äôll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand. For filmmakers ‚Äì the features you need, not the ones you don‚Äôt. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more. For photographers ‚Äì easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). For everyone else ‚Äì inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up. We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment. GENERAL FEATURES + Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders + Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions + Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder + Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios + Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio + Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES + RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing + RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds + Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format ‚Äì capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW + Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps FILMMAKER FEATURES + Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs + Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices) + Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants + Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options + RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure + Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time + Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels + HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen + Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth + Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu + Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases) + Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos + Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails WORKS WITH + iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings + Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one + Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction + Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster. + Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos + Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Quakeline
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫19,90 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫79,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫19,90

Application Description

After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love? In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city ‚Äî from Bakƒ±rk√∂y to √úsk√ºdar ‚Äî to find the woman you love. Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul ‚Äî from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor. On your journey to save your girlfriend, you‚Äôll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins‚Äîand their stories‚Äîwill push you to make difficult moral choices. To move forward, you‚Äôll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely. Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit. Witness the struggle to survive‚Äîand the power of hope. In this unforgettable journey, you‚Äôll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz Fusion
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

SessionBand Jazz Fusion ‚Äì Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world‚Äôs only chord-based loop app. With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists. Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others. For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea ‚Äì Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne ‚Äì Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...). Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles! Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier. Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music: ‚Ä¢ Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles ‚Ä¢ Choose your chords ‚Ä¢ Stretch or shorten loops ‚Ä¢ Build up your track in minutes ‚Ä¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Auto-transpose your entire track ‚Ä¢ Add FX ‚Ä¢ Mix your track ‚Ä¢ Adjust track tempo ‚Ä¢ Record direct to audio ‚Ä¢ Copy straight to other music apps ‚Ä¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: ‚Ä¢ Practice with your own world-class band ‚Ä¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections ‚Ä¢ Mute instrument channels as you like ‚Ä¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly ‚Ä¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Transpose your whole track instantly You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! ‚Ä¢ Simple, intuitive interface ‚Ä¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô allows simple creation of a full track ‚Ä¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: ‚Ä¢ 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four ‚Ä¢ Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‚Äòstop‚Äô ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove ‚Ä¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps ‚Ä¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

entry.title: SessionBand Jazz 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

Application Description

Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get: 1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords 2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style 3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key! 4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create 5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster. With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from. Create professional jazz tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free jazz tracks. Hear the results. Watch the video at www.sessionbandapp.com The fastest way to create your own studio-quality jazz: ‚Ä¢ Pick one of 8 jazz styles ‚Ä¢ Choose your chords ‚Ä¢ Stretch or shorten loops ‚Ä¢ Build up your track in minutes ‚Ä¢ Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Auto-transpose your entire track ‚Ä¢ Add FX ‚Ä¢ Mix ‚Ä¢ Change tempo ‚Ä¢ Record direct to audio ‚Ä¢ Copy straight to other music apps ‚Ä¢ Share with the world! The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians: ‚Ä¢ Practice with your own world-class quartet ‚Ä¢ Loop markers let you focus on specific sections ‚Ä¢ Mute instrument channels as you like ‚Ä¢ Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly ‚Ä¢ 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos ‚Ä¢ Transpose your whole track instantly ‚Ä¢ Download backing tracks for over 150 jazz standards for free (with chord sheets) ready to play. Transpose them with just one touch! Get some of the world's best jazz musicians playing on your tracks: ‚Ä¢ Jason Rebello (Piano): Sting; Jeff Beck; Wayne Shorter; Peter Gabriel... ‚Ä¢ Jeremy Stacey (Drums): Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds; King Crimson; Amy Winehouse; Take That; Eric Clapton... ‚Ä¢ Patrick Clahar (Sax); Bill Bruford's Earthworks; Incognito; Stevie Wonder; James Brown... ‚Ä¢ Geoff Gascoyne (Bass); Sting; Van Morrison; Guy Barker; Georgie Fame... You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free! ‚Ä¢ Simple, intuitive interface ‚Ä¢ Audition the loop you are about to insert ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô allows simple creation of a full track ‚Ä¢ Intuitive mixing and record functions Detailed Product Information: ‚Ä¢ 8 classic and contemporary jazz styles: Elvin Swing; McCoy Three; Mozambique; Sting Swing; Latin Strings; Classical Five; Swing Bass; Up Swing Strings ‚Ä¢ Tempos from 107bpm to 190bpm ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‚Äòstop‚Äô ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove ‚Ä¢ The musical content in this app cannot be found in any of the other SessionBand apps ‚Ä¢ All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

Create studio-quality soul, jazz and funk tracks to your own chords in minutes with the latest edition of the award-winning SessionBand app ‚Äì the world‚Äôs only chord-based loop app. Featuring exclusive royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Keyboards); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass). Volume 3 is the ultimate soul jazz funk play-along and the perfect tool for songwriters. Here's what you get: ‚Ä¢ 15 chord variations per root note in every style! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic soul jazz chords ‚Ä¢ 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style ‚Ä¢ Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create ‚Ä¢ New tech enhancements like ‚ÄòTrack Builder‚Äô to make the workflow even faster With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. This latest edition contains a diverse spread of 8 soul jazz funk styles from a Herbie Hancock slow burn, laid-back 70's funk groove all the way through to an exciting, uptempo neo-latin jazz rock groove in 7/4. You can check out samples of all the styles at www.sessionbandapp.com/sessionband-soul-jazz-funk-3-music-app-create-backing-tracks/ SessionBand Soul Jazz Funk 3 is a professional app ‚Äì essential for anyone learning jazz music and perfect for soul jazz funk musicians looking for the ultimate play-along. But equally, it‚Äôs simple enough for non-musicians who love music to create their own great sounding, copyright-free soul jazz funk music and share it with the world ‚Äì even if they don‚Äôt play a note! Create professional soul jazz funk tracks to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create, share and publish thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.
